dc_title_s: Arts and Culture Organizations as 501(c)3: Washington, D.C.
dc_description_s: The DC Commission on the Arts and Humanities recognizes the importance of remaining relevant in a city of competitive opportunities for residents who have at their disposal significant discretionary income for arts and cultural offerings. Further1 billion in economic activity is generated annually by the non-profit arts and culture industry in Washington Additionally These trends create an opportunity for DCCAH to position itself at the forefront of the city s cultural planning. To achieve this goal<a href="https://www.irs.gov/Charities--Non-Profits/Charitable-Organizations/Exemption-Requirements-Section-501(c)(3)-Organizations" target="_blank">Exemption Requirements - 501(c)(3) Organizations
